library(tidyverse)
library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)

subway <- tribble(
  ~station, ~x, ~y, ~onclick, ~type, 
  "Intro to Data Science (tutorial)", 0, 1, 'window.open("https://akshay-bareja.shinyapps.io/ds_intro_track/")', "tutorial",
  "Intro to Data Science (video)", 0, 0.99, 'window.open("https://youtu.be/TnPlET9mk0s")', "video",

  "Intro to Dplyr (tutorial)", 0.2, 1, 'window.open("https://bespokds.netlify.app/xaringan_intro_to_dplyr/#1")', "tutorial",
  "Intro to Dplyr (video)", 0.2, 0.99, 'window.open("https://youtu.be/W3D-JSPExXo")', "video",
  "Intro to Pandas (tutorial)", 0.2, 0.75, '', "tutorial",
  "Intro Pandas (video)", 0.2, 0.74, '', "video",
  "Selecting Variables Using Dplyr (tutorial)", 0.4, 1, 'window.open("https://bespokds.netlify.app/xaringan_select/#1")', "tutorial",
  "Selecting Variables Using Dplyr (video)", 0.4, 0.99, 'window.open("https://youtu.be/vDgP7J1qMCI")', "video",

  "Selecting Variables Using Pandas (video)", 0.4, 0.74, '', "video"
)

gg_subway <- ggplot(subway, aes(x = x, y = y)) +
               # tracks
               geom_segment(x = 0, xend = 0.2, y = 1, yend = 1, size = 5, colour = "blue") +
               geom_segment(x = 0, xend = 0.2, y = 0.99, yend = 0.99, size = 5, colour = "red") +
               geom_curve(x = 0, xend = 0.2, y = 0.98, yend = 0.75, size = 5, colour = "orange",
                          curvature = 0.05) +
               geom_curve(x = 0, xend = 0.2, y = 0.97, yend = 0.74, size = 5, colour = "darkgreen",
                          curvature = 0.05) +
               geom_segment(x = 0.2, xend = 0.2, y = 0.99, yend = 0.75, linetype = 2) +
               geom_segment(x = 0.2, xend = 0.4, y = 1, yend = 1, size = 5, colour = "blue") +
               geom_segment(x = 0.2, xend = 0.4, y = 0.99, yend = 0.99, size = 5, colour = "red") +

                        x = 0.25, xend = 0.3,
                        y = 1.04, yend = 1.04,
                        size = 1,
                        colour = "darkgreen") +
               annotate("text", 
                        label = "Python track (tutorial)",
                        x = 0.347, y = 1.06,
                        size = 3,
                        fontface = "bold") +
               annotate("text",
                        label = "Python track (video)",
                        x = 0.345, y = 1.04,
                        size = 3,
                        fontface = "bold") +
               # station names
               annotate("text",
                        label = "Intro",
                        x = 0, y = 1.025,
                        size = 3,

               annotate("text",

                        x = 0.2, y = 1.025,

                annotate("text",

urls_dt <- paste0('<a href=', links_dt, '>', 'Introduction to Data Science ', '</a>')

types <- c("slides",
          "video",
          "video",
          "video",
          "quiz",
          "exercise",
          "video",
          "video",
          "video",
          "video",
          "video",
          "exercise",
          "exercise",
          "video")

languages <- c("multiple",
          "multiple",
          "multiple",
          "R",
          "R",
          "R",
          "R",
          "R",
          "R",
          "R",
          "R",
          "R",
          "R",
          "R")

titles <- str_to_title(str_replace_all(sub(".*section-", "", links_dt), "-", " ")) # ugh

levels <- rep("beginner", 14)


df_dt <- tibble(
                Title = titles,
                Level = levels,
                Language = languages,
                Type = types,
                `Include in` = urls_dt)

df_dt %>% 
  datatable(rownames = FALSE, escape = -5,
            filter = 'top')

```{r tracks, fig.width = 10, fig.height = 10}
links_two <- c("https://akshay-bareja.shinyapps.io/ds_intro_track/")

df_two <- tribble(
  ~Track, ~Tutorial, 
  "Introduction to Data Science", paste0("<a href=\"", links_two[1], "\">", as.character(fa("road")), "</a>"),
  "Exploratory Data Analysis", paste0("<a href=\"", "", "\">", as.character(fa("road")), "</a>"),
  "Making Plots", paste0("<a href=\"", "", "\">", as.character(fa("road")), "</a>"),
)

df_two %>%
  kable("html", escape = FALSE, table.attr = "style='width:100%;'", align = 'c') %>%
  kable_styling(bootstrap_options = c("hover", "condensed", "responsive")) %>%
  #row_spec(row = 1:nrow(df), color = "white", background = "#90ee90") %>%# can start at 0 (to include header)
  column_spec(1, color = "darkblue") %>%
  column_spec(2, color = "black") 
```
